name: Nasty Neighbors: No Country for Curmudgeon
storyline:
The story takes place in a Russian village where a local tycoon who has made his fortune by moderately legal means, is building a luxurious but gaudy mansion. Surrounded by old rickety log houses the mansion looks rather obnoxious.
Offended by such tycoon’s attitude a clever and cheerful village boy tries to make things difficult for him by inventing many funny and surprising pranks. To do this he must search locations for any items that can be used to make troubles for other characters.
summary: A logic-arcade game in which we plague a certain rich neighbor in various ways. The game consists in sabotaging the devices located in the neighbor's villa, as well as causing accidents involving the neighbor. All this is shown in a humorous form and with a big pinch of salt.
